transcript.text: hey I want to take a couple of minutes
and just tell you what God has been
speaking to me about some of the events
taking place in America around the world
I heard the Lord very clearly speak to
me several weeks ago and said be ready
demons principalities powers the the
justice the spiritual realm of darkness
is about to start manifesting and now
I'm watching that happen much of the
anger and government institutions the
protests that are happening and the
violence on our streets and even some of
the leaders around the world like in
North Korea Syria some of these
conflicts that have escalated a lot of
this is the manifestation of evil
spirits they are upset and they are
angry they are angry because they know
we have moved into a season we the
church well in the earth but we as
believers have moved into a season where
we can experience great breakthrough in
fact some of the breakthroughs that we
have been crying out for and interceding
for for years maybe decades we are in a
season where we can experience the
fullness of that breakthrough for
example the Supreme Court evil spirits
are upset and he actually took me to a
passage in Joshua when Joshua and the
and the Israelites were about to move
across the Jordan and possess the
inheritance that God had promised to
them he said Joshua of course sent the
twelve spies to spy out the land and
when they came to Jericho
the spies encountered a lady Rahab who
said to them and I thought thought this
is very interesting because this is the
passage God took me to when I was when
he was telling me this she said we are
all afraid of you and she said everyone
in the land is living in terror for
we've heard
how the Lord made a dry path for you
through the Red Sea and then she dumped
the week we heard I judged the gods of
II of Egypt the bottom line was these
people have been living in fear of
Israel for almost 40 years
that's how terrified they were and when
the enemy grows insecure and fearful he
reacts it's just like the Canaanites I
said we better fight these people and we
better fight hard because God's going to
give them this land if we don't and
that's why I think it's happening right
now the Lord said to me the enemy is is
very fearful you don't need to be afraid
that's what he said to me and said tell
my people they don't need to be afraid
his enemies are afraid and they're
manifesting what should we do
number one we should pray diligently for
our government leaders President Trump
our Congress our leaders in certain
State Department places like this we
need to pray for them because they're
making some very very important
decisions right now especially regarding
Syria Russia the Middle East Isis of
course but also North Korea has really
intensified I'm not alarmed by that but
I but I understand the seriousness of it
and what I feel like the Lord has said
to me is pray for the overthrow that
this is a season that we should pray
diligently for the overthrow of this
evil regime in North Korea I believe
that in God's timing we moved into a
season where that can happen I believe
God wants to save those North Korean
people I believe he wants to reunify the
north and the south and I believe he
wants enough stability in the earth that
will allow him to bring forth the
harvest that he has intended for this
season and he's not going to let a
madman like this guy in North Korea stop
it I don't think God wants us to go to
war and I'm not saying that but there
are other ways he could deal with this
man he could just take him out himself
or
it could help us they seem to be moving
in that direction or there could be a
coup from within but I believe this is a
season we should pray pray that this man
doesn't do anything foolish and release
any nuclear weapons pray that he's taken
out first
pray that God intervenes and pray always
and continually for the harvest and and
pray again pray for pray for President
Trump and those around him he won't make
any unwise decisions pray for our
military leaders no one makes any unwise
decisions pray that they make wise
decisions and that that we are all
protected that South Korea is protected
Japan is protected great harvest coming
to these nations great harvests coming
to Japan I've seen for years there's a
huge revival coming to Japan they're not
going to be wiped out by North Korea
God's going to bring salvation to
millions of them but we need to pray
that so be at peace but don't take
anything for granted
we're not alarmed they they are alarmed
the enemy is alarm what are we going to
do we're going to pray we're going to
fight like Joshua but we're going to
fight with our spiritual weapons and
we're going to say no you're not going
to win God's going to win this thing and
we are going to possess the inheritance
that he's off he's giving us as a
generation which is this great harvest
so just to encourage you don't be
alarmed pray this is a season of
breakthrough all right thanks god bless
